HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: The price is automatically displayed in the shopping cart. No fixed price list available.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 3 to 14 working days for in-stock items. For items that need to be ordered, the customer will be notified of the delivery time by phone or email.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Delivery is available to most islands. For smaller islands, delivery is made to the nearest ferry port.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: The price is automatically displayed in the shopping cart. No fixed price list available.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 3 to 14 working days for in-stock items. For items that need to be ordered, the customer will be notified of the delivery time by phone or email.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Delivery is available to most islands. For smaller islands, delivery is made to the nearest ferry port.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery is available for all products, including bulky items, across Croatia. In-store pickup is also an option at their Zagreb and Pula locations. Parcel shop and locker delivery are not offered.
PRICING: Delivery costs are not listed and are calculated dynamically at checkout. Information on free shipping thresholds is not available. Pricing for in-store pickup is not mentioned.
PROVIDERS: The specific courier companies used for delivery are not specified.
DELIVERY TIME: The standard delivery timeframe for in-stock items is 3 to 14 working days. For out-of-stock items, customers are contacted with an estimated delivery date.
NOTABLE FEATURES: An assembly service is available for furniture, kitchens, and bedroom sets. Delivery to smaller Croatian islands is restricted to the nearest ferry port.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information provided is very basic and lacks important details. Key information such as delivery providers, a price list, and potential surcharges (like COD) is missing. The lack of a transparent pricing structure, with costs only revealed at checkout, is a significant drawback for user experience. Information is not centralized, requiring users to check different parts of the site (e.g., footer for store locations).
